title: 15 Minute Guided Meditation | Clear & Calm The Mind In Uncertain Times
description:
This 15 minute guided meditation to clear and calm the mind is a perfect powerful practice for beginner & experienced meditation practices.  It is perfect tool to help cope with the uncertainty, to ground and rebalance yourself and your constant wandering mind. 

Through the simple act of reconnecting with your inner self and practicing the idea of positive affirmations of gratitude for the simple things in life, this easy guided meditation is perfect for anyone that is needing some positivity and calm during these uncertain times. It is time to let go of the negativity, stress, anxiety....whatever is holding you back in your life. Let this class take you on a meditative journey to cleanse and heal yourself from the inside out.

As you close your eyes and virtually join me on this meditative canoe ride through the Amazon River in Peru, may gift yourself the opportunity to let go of all that no longer serves you. Let go of the tension, the stress, the anxiety, the fear, whatever it is that is holding you back in your mind and simply focus on that inner feeling of peace and joy that is within you. Let go and go within. 

So find a quiet space, put some headphones on, close your eyes, and enjoy. 

🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 
https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

Namaste ! The Dalai Lama said,  if we would teach every 8 years old, how to meditate,  in one generation,  all the wars and disagreements would disappear and we would be able to solve the world problems without any issue and worries...Who's ready to meditate today ? ❤❤❤❤❤

I always return to you, to your practice and meditation. Because your voice is my favorite in guided meditation. Always so calm, peaceful and complete. Always the best choice of music and thoughts you give to us. Thank you both for everything you did and do. 🤍 🤍
This video was absolutely perfect. I cried but I feel sho much lighter. Thank you for building this community of love and support!

I am so incredibly grateful for this meditation. I went into it feeling stressed and anxious, and came out of it with tears streaming down my face. As soon as the simple, powerful mantra was introduced, I couldn’t help but just cry. It felt so releasing. I am grateful for all that I have in my life, especially during these tough times. Thank you guys so much.
Sending you both love and light. Namaste.
